A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have quite a bit to say but it’s useless to throw it all up into a review that may or not be read about someone who actually cares - but I can most certainly say with confidence - there wouldn’t be a Star Wars series if it started out with a movie like this.. Lack of character building - check Substantial lack of plot - check More time spent on cheesy one liners than quality light saber battles and Jedi training - check Multiple time in the theater where people say out loud “what just happened\, why - huhhh?!” - check Losing grip on a Star Wars fan - check
